publications.name: Deploying NetScaler CPX in Google Container Engine (GKE)
publications.summary: This literature provides a instruction on how to deploy NetScaler CPX within a Kubernetes cluster on Google Cloud to take on the functional role of KubeProxy and thereby load-balance and auto discover microservices.

publications.name: Introduction to Docker 101
publications.summary: This literature provides an introduction to key concepts in containerization. This tutorial focuses on providing instruction to gain hands on experience on running Docker containers, creating Docker images, executing Docker commands, and automate deployment of a container driven 'developer environment' using docker-compose.

publications.name: Introduction to NetScaler VPX in AWS
publications.summary: This literature provides an introduction to key concepts of AWS Cloud. This tutorial focuses on providing instruction to gain hands on experience with Cloud networking with VPCs, provisioning instances with EC2, managing persistent storage with EFS and S3, and configuring NetScaler VPX in the cloud.

publications.name: A regenerative microchannel device for recording multiple single-unit action potentials in awake, ambulatory animals
publications.summary: This study reports on the development of a fully integrated, regenerative microchannel interface with microelectrodes for nerve signal extraction and capabilities to enabling evaluation in an awake and ambulatory rat animal model. This study marks a significant advance in neural interfacing, demonstrating the capability of microchannels to be used for communicating with peripheral nerves.

publications.name: Microchannels as a Regenerative Construct for Peripheral Nerve Interfacing.
publications.summary: These studies showed that precisely fabricated microchannels support and direct the regeneration/migration of axons, Schwann cells, and fibroblasts through the microchannels during nerve regeneration and recovery. Results provided evidence that the construct is biologically compatible for in vivo peripheral neural interfacing.
